issues.message: transform may need vendor prefixes for older browsers
transition may need vendor prefixes for older browsers
animation may need vendor prefixes for older browsers
backdrop-filter may need vendor prefixes for older browsers
High usage of box-shadow (77 instances) may impact performance
issues.suggestion: Consider using fewer shadows or CSS-only alternatives

issues.message: High usage of will-change (14 instances) may impact memory
issues.suggestion: Only use will-change on elements that will actually change

issues.message: Some interactive elements may be missing focus styles
issues.suggestion: Ensure all interactive elements have visible focus indicators

recommendations.message: Consider providing fallbacks for CSS Grid (suggestion: flexbox or float layouts)
Consider providing fallbacks for CSS Custom Properties (suggestion: Sass variables)
Consider providing fallbacks for backdrop-filter (suggestion: solid background colors)
Verify color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text)
recommendations.suggestion: Use automated tools to check color contrast
